extension.description:
Directory of radio stations that uses www.radio-browser.info as source.
If you miss your favourite station, just go to www.radio-browser.info and add it yourself. It is a wiki like system.

Колекция от радио станции, с източник www.radio-browser.info
Ако любимата ви станция не е в списъка, можете да я добавите като посетите www.radio-browser.info

Verzeichnis von Radio-Stationen das www.radio-browser.info als Quelle nutzt.
Vermisst du deine Lieblingsstation? Kein problem: geh auf www.radio-browser.info und füge sie für alle Benutzer hinzu!
Сваля и инсталира добавки от неофициалното хранилище на Majide.
Download and install add-ons from unofficial repository of Majide.
extension.disclaimer: Majide не е автор на всички добавки в хранилището и не носи отговорност за съдържанието им и ефекта от инсталирането им във вашето устройство!
Majide did not make all the add-ons in this repository and is not responsible for their content and effect of installing them on your device!

extension.description: Weather forecast provided by Yahoo, Weatherbit and Openweathermap
For installing videos, musics and subtitles addons

extension.summary: Did you fall asleep? Get better control over media playback
Adormeceu? Tenha melhor controlo sobre a reprodução de media
extension.description: This service addon makes Kodi stop any playback if it exceeds a given playback time. If you have that awful habit of leaving Kodi playing live content after you fell asleep, this addon is for you! It gives extended control over the playback time. Step mute the audio, enable the screensaver or run a custom command after the playback is stopped.

Este service addon faz com que o Kodi pare qualquer playback se o seu tempo exceder um valor fornecido. Se tiver o hábito de adormecer enquanto o Kodi está a reproduzir conteúdo multimédia, este addon é para si! Este extende o controlo do tempo de reprodução. Baixe o volume do áudio, active o protector de ecrã ou execute um comando customizado após a reprodução ser interrompida.

extension.summary: Execute custom script on screensaver activation / deactivation.
extension.description: Initial version.
extension.disclaimer: I'm not responsible for any possible damage done to your devices.

extension.description: Send remote commands to you tv.[CR]Based on: https://github.com/breunigs/bravia-auth-and-remote
extension.disclaimer: I'm not responsible for any damage on your equipment.

extension.summary: Приставка за гледане на IPTV от Виваком
Addon for watching IPTV from Vivacom
extension.disclaimer: За да използвате приставката се нуждаете от валиден и платен абонамент за Vivacom TV GO. Приставката предоставя достъп до каналите за които имате валиден абонамент и които така или иначе може да гледате с ТВ ГО приложението. Приставката е неофициална и няма нищо общо с Vivacom. Made for fun!

extension.description: Description for "Btv Plus"
Description for "Btv Plus"
Scheduled loading playlist from local or remote resource. Replaces values in streams with values from predefined map, or adds new values Replaces dynamic stream urls with static ones.

extension.description: This plugin provides access to tv streams from http://www.bgtv-on.com/. Note: http://www.bgtv-on.com/ account is required.
extension.disclaimer: You have to sign up and pay to access http://www.bgtv-on.com/ TV streams.
extension.news: v4.2.2 (02/03/2020) [new] The plugin is re-written using xbmcswift2 plugin, which provides some new features. [fix] Some fixes into addon.xml file. v4.2.3 (10/03/2020) [new] added contextmenu() on the place of select(), for the newer versions of Kodi. Older version will still work with select() v4.2.4 (12/03/2020) [fix] Small bugfixes v5.0.0 (TBD) [new] TBD v5.0.1 (bugfix) [fix] a problem with the first login is fixed v5.0.2 (fix) [fix] the problem with recorded videos v6.1.0 [new] Python3 compatible

extension.news: IMPORTANT: Please enter your login-cookie into line 9 of resources/settings.xml as default-value (see manuel) v.13.2.2+matrix.0 (2023-01-20): - Kodi 20 support v.13.2.1+matrix.1 (2021-03-13): - fixed that stream starts again v.13.2.0+matrix.1 (2021-02-27): - added stream selection v.13.1.13 (2021-02-23): - Kodi 19 ready v.13.1.12 (2021-01-24): - added more stream-information into the interface v.13.1.11 (2020-12-29): - fixed error with eurosport 2 and added cookie to setting.xml v.13.1.10 (2020-09-26): - fixed useragent error v.13.1.9 (2020-09-26): - fixed issue with header v.13.1.8 (2020-05-16): - fixed issue with date/time v.13.1.7 (2020-05-11): - fixed issue with georestrictionscheck v.13.1.6 (2020-01-31): - fixed issue with missing secondary title v.13.1.5 (2020-01-25): - shorted events (time) v13.1.4 (2020-01-12): - added error handling if verifiedHomeTerritory is not available v13.1.3 (2020-01-12): - added error handling for false cookie v13.1.2 (2020-01-05): - highlight liveevents at schedule v13.1.1 (2020-01-05): - added schedule v13.1.0 (2020-01-01): - issues with android devices solved - archive added v13.0.0 (2019-12-31): - first initial. Please enter your login-cookie into line 120 of default.py
extension.description: Eurosport Player ist der Eurosport-Abonnementservice, mit dem Sie vollständigen und unbegrenzten LIVE- und On-Demand-Zugriff auf die Eurosport-Kanäle und exklusive Inhalte erhalten.
extension.disclaimer: Inoffizielles Addon - Benutzung auf eigene Gefahr
extension.description: Eurosport Player is the Eurosport subscription service to enjoy full and unlimited access to the Eurosport channels and exclusive content LIVE and on demand.
extension.disclaimer: Unofficial Addon - Use at your own risk
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
